Control Name: 14.1.1 Information securtiy requirements analysis and specifications
Control Statement: Are information risk analysis, functional and technical requirement specification, security architecture/design, security testing and certification etc. mandatory activities for all new developments and changes to existing systems.  Are information risks handled in a similar way for commercial systems and software including bespoke, custom and off-the-shelf products
